data.text:
Mouse Mat

A high quality photographic print manufactured into a durable wipe clean mouse mat (27x22cm) with a non slip backing, which works with all mice.

Archive quality photographic print in a durable wipe clean mouse mat with non slip backing. Works with all computer mice

Estimated Image Size (if not cropped) is 25.4cm x 16.2cm (10" x 6.4")

Estimated Product Size is 26.9cm x 21.8cm (10.6" x 8.6")

These are individually made so all sizes are approximate

Artwork printed orientated as per the preview above, with landscape (horizontal) orientation to match the source image.

EDITORS COMMENTS

This print captures the elegant couple, Felix Yusupov and his wife Princess Irina Alexandrovna of Russia, in 1932. The portrait exudes a timeless charm as it showcases their regal presence and undeniable connection. Felix Yusupov, known for his involvement in the assassination of Grigori Rasputin, appears refined and sophisticated in this image. His piercing gaze reflects a sense of mystery that surrounds him. Beside him stands Princess Irina Alexandrovna of Russia, radiating grace and poise befitting her royal lineage. The anonymous photographer skillfully captured the essence of this power couple through their subtle expressions and body language. Their intertwined hands convey an unbreakable bond while also hinting at the secrets they may share. Stored within a private collection, this rare photograph offers us a glimpse into a bygone era when aristocracy reigned supreme in Russia. It serves as a testament to the enduring allure of historical figures such as Felix Yusupov and Princess Irina Alexandrovna. As we admire this piece from Heritage Images' archive photos collection, we are reminded of the rich tapestry woven by history's most fascinating personalities. This print is not just an artistic masterpiece but also an invaluable window into the lives of those who shaped our past.
